Class FacePad

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.id3.face.FacePad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class FacePad
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Serializable
    This class represents a FacePad object of the Face module.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • close

        Releases all resources used by this FacePad.

        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

      • getHandle

        public long getHandle()
        Gets the native handle.
        Returns:
        The native handle.

      • computeBlurrinessScore

        public int computeBlurrinessScore(Image image,
                                  DetectedFace detectedFace)
                           throws FaceException
        Computes a blurriness score for a color image. An attack presented on a low resolution support has more chance to be blurred than a bonafide. The maximum recommended value is 20.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        Returns:
        Computed blurriness score. In the range [0:100].
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • computeColorBasedScore

        public int computeColorBasedScore(Image image,
                                  DetectedFace detectedFace)
                           throws FaceException
        Computes the PAD score of a detected face using only the color image. A high score means a high probability for the face to be bona-fide, hence not an attack. The minimum recommended value is 50.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        Returns:
        Computed PAD score. In the range [0:100].
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • computeDepthBasedScore

        public int computeDepthBasedScore(Image image,
                                  DetectedFace detectedFace)
                           throws FaceException
        Computes the PAD score of a detected face using a depth map image. A high score means a high probability for the face to be bona-fide, hence not an attack. The minimum recommended value is 10.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process. Must be Grayscale 16 Bits.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        Returns:
        Computed PAD score. In the range [0:100].
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • computeMoireScore

        public int computeMoireScore(Image image,
                             DetectedFace detectedFace)
                      throws FaceException
        Computes the Moir√© score of a detected face using a color image. An attack presented on a screen will likely present Moir√© effects whereas a bonafide will not. The maximum recommended value is 10.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        Returns:
        Computed Moir√© score. In the range [0:100].
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • detectAttackSupport

        public DetectedFaceAttackSupport detectAttackSupport(Image image,
                                                     DetectedFace detectedFace)
                                              throws FaceException
        Detects if an attack support surrounds the detected face. The recommended usage is to consider the image to be an attack as soon as an attack support is detected.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        Returns:
        Detected face attack support.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.
